# [P1] Add meta tags, OpenGraph, Twitter cards, and JSON-LD for homepage

**Labels:** P1, seo, content
**Estimate:** 0.5d

## Description
Add page metadata including title, description, canonical link, OpenGraph, Twitter card, and JSON-LD Organization/Product schema for the homepage. Ensure metadata is present in `Index.tsx` or a shared head component.

## Acceptance criteria
- Head tags present and valid (test via Facebook/Twitter debuggers).
- JSON-LD validates with schema.org.
- Canonical link set correctly.

## Checklist
- [ ] Add meta tags to `Index.tsx` or shared head.
- [ ] Add JSON-LD snippet.
- [ ] Validate using debug tools.
